title: INTRODUCTION TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section outlines the terms governing the use of Apple's various services and the requirements for access.

title: USING OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section details the process of acquiring content, including the nature of transactions and licensing agreements.

title: PAYMENTS, TAXES AND REFUNDS
Purpose: This section explains the payment methods, billing processes, and conditions for refunds related to transactions on Apple’s services.

title: Right of cancellation
Purpose: This section explains the user's right to cancel their order within 14 days of receipt.

title: Effects of cancellation
Purpose: This section details the process and timeframe for reimbursement after a cancellation notice.

title: Exception to the right of cancellation
Purpose: This section outlines circumstances under which the cancellation right cannot be exercised.

title: ACCOUNT
Purpose: This section describes the requirements and responsibilities associated with creating and maintaining an Apple ID.

title: PRIVACY
Purpose: This section states that the use of services is subject to Apple's Privacy Policy.

title: SERVICES AND CONTENT USAGE RULES
Purpose: This section outlines the rules governing the use of services and content to ensure compliance.

title: Audio and Video Content Sales and Rentals:
Purpose: This section details the rules and restrictions for the purchasing, renting, and usage of audio and video content.

title: App Store Content:
Purpose: This section defines the types of apps and content available for download and the licenses associated with them.

title: Apple Music:
Purpose: This section explains the streaming limitations for individual and family Apple Music memberships.

title: Apple Arcade:
Purpose: This section discusses the download and access limitations for Apple Arcade apps based on subscription status.

title: Apple TV Content:
Purpose: This section provides details on the streaming capabilities for Apple TV content across multiple devices.

title: DOWNLOADS
Purpose: This section outlines limitations and conditions regarding downloading content and the ability to redownload it.

title: SUBSCRIPTIONS
Purpose: This section explains the terms and conditions surrounding the purchase and management of subscription services.

title: CONTENT AND SERVICE AVAILABILITY
Purpose: This section details the availability of services and content based on your home country and travel status.

title: THIRD-PARTY DEVICES AND EQUIPMENT
Purpose: This section outlines the limitations and conditions for using services on non-Apple devices and with third-party equipment.

title: YOUR SUBMISSIONS TO OUR SERVICES
Purpose: This section describes the submission feature of the services and the compliance required with the Submissions Guidelines.

title: Submissions Guidelines
Purpose: This section outlines the prohibited actions and content when using the Services.

title: FAMILY SHARING
Purpose: This section details the requirements and functions of Family Sharing on Apple devices.

title: Purchase Sharing
Purpose: This section explains how eligible content can be shared among Family members through Purchase Sharing.

title: Ask to Buy
Purpose: This section describes the Ask to Buy feature, allowing organizers to approve transactions by underage family members.

title: Family Member changes
Purpose: This section informs about the effects on access to content when a Family member leaves or is removed from the Family.

title: Family Sharing Rules
Purpose: This section outlines the rules governing membership and participation in a Family Sharing group.

title: E  SERIES PASS AND MULTI-PASS
Purpose: This section explains the types of passes available for purchasing and receiving television content, including the conditions under which refunds may be issued for unprovided episodes.

title: ADDITIONAL APP STORE TERMS (EXCLUDING APPLE ARCADE APPS)
Purpose: This section outlines terms related to the use and licensing of apps available on the App Store, distinguishing between Apple Apps and Third Party Apps.

title: IN-APP PURCHASES
Purpose: This section details the rules governing in-app purchases, including authentication requirements and limitations on transferred purchases.

title: APP MAINTENANCE AND SUPPORT
Purpose: This section clarifies the responsibilities of Apple for maintaining and supporting Apple Apps versus Third Party Apps.

title: APP BUNDLES
Purpose: This section describes the pricing and purchasing process for apps that are sold together in bundles.

title: SEARCH RESULTS AND RANKINGS
Purpose: This section explains how apps are ordered in search results based on various parameters including metadata and user engagement.

title: LICENSED APPLICATION END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
Purpose: This section states that apps available through the App Store are licensed to users rather than sold.

title: Scope of License
Purpose: This section outlines the terms and conditions under which the user may utilize the Licensed Application.

title: Consent to Use of Data
Purpose: This section describes the user's agreement to data collection and its usage by the Licensor for improving products and services.

title: Termination
Purpose: This section details the conditions under which the agreement may be terminated by either party.

title: External Services
Purpose: This section explains the user's responsibilities and risks when accessing third-party services connected to the Licensed Application.

title: WARRANTY
Purpose: This section states that Licensor will provide the Licensed Application and any related External Services with reasonable care.

title: Limitation of Liability
Purpose: This section outlines the circumstances under which the Licensor is not liable for loss or damage related to the use of the External Services and sets limitations on liability.

title: Export Control
Purpose: This section specifies restrictions on the export and use of the Licensed Application in compliance with U.S. laws.

title: U.S. Government End Users
Purpose: This section clarifies the licensing terms for U.S. government end users concerning the Licensed Application.

title: Governing Law
Purpose: This section establishes that the Agreement will be governed by the laws of California and stipulates jurisdiction for disputes.

title: ADDITIONAL TERMS FOR CONTENT ACQUIRED FROM THIRD PARTIES
Purpose: This section clarifies the relationship between you, Apple, and third-party content providers regarding the acquisition of content.

title: ADDITIONAL APPLE MUSIC TERMS
Purpose: This section details the features and limitations of the iCloud Music Library associated with Apple Music subscriptions.

title: ADDITIONAL APPLE FITNESS+ TERMS
Purpose: This section emphasizes that Apple Fitness+ is for entertainment and informational use only and not a substitute for professional medical advice.

title: CARRIER MEMBERSHIP
Purpose: This section explains the purchase and billing dynamics of a Service membership acquired through a wireless carrier.

title: MISCELLANEOUS TERMS APPLICABLE TO ALL SERVICES
Purpose: This section contains various terms that apply broadly to all services offered.

title: DEFINITION OF APPLE
Purpose: This section provides specific definitions of what 'Apple' refers to in relation to different geographical regions.

title: CONTRACT CHANGES
Purpose: This section states that Apple can modify the terms of the agreement and outlines the process for such modifications.

title: THIRD-PARTY MATERIALS
Purpose: This section clarifies that Apple is not liable for any third-party content linked within their services.

title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
Purpose: This section emphasizes the proprietary rights Apple holds over its services and content, prohibiting unauthorized use.

title: COPYRIGHT
Purpose: This section informs users that Apple owns the copyrights for its services and explains the process for reporting copyright infringement.

title: TERMINATION AND SUSPENSION OF SERVICES
Purpose: This section describes the conditions under which Apple can terminate or suspend services and user accounts for non-compliance with the agreement.

title: DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIABILITY LIMITATIONS
Purpose: This section limits Apple's liability and disclaims any warranties regarding the uninterrupted or error-free provision of services.

title: STATUTORY EXCEPTIONS FOR PUBLIC INSTITUTIONS
Purpose: This section clarifies the enforceability of the Agreement for qualified public educational or government institutions under applicable law.

title: GOVERNING LAW
Purpose: This section specifies the governing law and jurisdiction for disputes arising from the Agreement, outlining the conditions based on the user's location.

title: OTHER PROVISIONS
Purpose: This section outlines the entirety of the Agreement, the applicability of other laws, and the consequences of invalid provisions while preserving remaining terms.

title: Last Updated: 12 September 2022
Purpose: This section indicates the date when the terms were last modified.
